page.title: 10LOCAL SHOPPING AREA, HARROW.
page.content: {Hatch End}boasts many{restaurants, catering for all tastes and pockets! residents can choose from a wide variety of cuisine:{Greek, Chinese, {Indian}or{European.}The "Akropolis" is a Greek restaurant and food is bought fresh in the morning and cooked on the premises. There are two "take-away" facilities: a{fish and chip shop}and a {pizza parlour.}For a shopping area of this size, there are more restaurants than would be expected. This reflects the affluence of a London suburb such as Hatch End, and the fact that adult entertainment revolves around "eating out". Many of the other shops in Hatch End are expensive and range from fashion shops and speciality food and confectionary outlets to tobacconists. The most popular shop is Budgens:a supermarket.
